bill_title: Congratulating and commending the West Central High School Football Team for winning the 2013 Class 11A State Football Championship.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Congratulating and commending the West Central High School Football Team for winning the 2013 Class 11A State Football Championship. WHEREAS, the West Central Trojans won ten of their twelve total games during the 2013 season, including the championship game against Madison High School where the Trojans scored the winning touchdown with only nineteen seconds left in the game; and WHEREAS, all the coaching staff, including Coach Kent Mueller, put in immeasurable time and dedication to inspiring their students to play well; and WHEREAS, two students were awarded three different honors in this championship game: Cody Bussell earning most valuable player and most outstanding back, and John Blue earning most outstanding lineman: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-Ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the West Central High School Football Team and its coaching staff are congratulated and commended for their outstanding performance in 2013.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Congratulating and commending the West Central High School Football Team for winning the 2013 Class 11A State Football Championship. WHEREAS, the West Central Trojans won ten of their twelve total games during the 2013 season, including the championship game against Madison High School where the Trojans scored the winning touchdown with only nineteen seconds left in the game; and WHEREAS, all the coaching staff, including Coach Kent Mueller, put in immeasurable time and dedication to inspiring their students to play well; and WHEREAS, two students were awarded three different honors in this championship game: Cody Bussell earning most valuable player and most outstanding back, and John Blue earning most outstanding lineman: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-Ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the West Central High School Football Team and its coaching staff are congratulated and commended for their outstanding performance in 2013. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
